original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2996)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2996)@</color>對目標區域召喚冰刺、火柱與雷霆進行攻擊。造成<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2996)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力傷害</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2996)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力傷害</color>的攻擊。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2996)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2996)@</color> summon ice spikes, fire pillars and thunder to attack the target area. Causes <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(2996)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2996)@</color><color=# 13ccd7>Intellectual damage</color> attack.
